name: Alan Cobian
coverLetter: Family has been growing for about 5 years so lots of the experience is there . I’ve done from cloning, transplanting, flushing, making food for the plants ,irrigation, de leafing , to harvesting , trimming, and if you’ve ever carried bags full of wet blocks it’s not fun . I would be available 24/7 all I ask for is a floor space to sleep I will pay any bills needed and my utilities .
